name: Put hello world

on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - '*'
  workflow_dispatch:
    
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
    - name: update apt-get
      run: sudo apt-get update

    - name: checkout
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: put hello world
      run: cat hello.txt
